Reverie presents five nights of discovery

Explore the best sound Reverie has to offer with a lineup of 25 artists. The best sets of 2020 all under pacific coast skies. The best part? It's free.

View Schedule

About

20 artists
5 nights

Infini is about looking ahead. Taking care of your life off the grid and listening to Reverie’s best and newest in electronic music. Having begun life as an outlet for the deeper and more progressive end of the trio’s DJ sets, Reverie has grown into one of the dance music world’s most respected imprints. Over its 15 years and 300+ releases, the sound of the label has evolved, but while the BPMs may have slowed, the mission statement of Reverie has remained the same - to release timeless soulful and melodic electronic music.

2020 Headliners

01

Qrion

Qrion connected with the world well beyond her home in northern Japan, working with producers like Ryan Hemsworth, How To Dress Well, Giraffage, and many more.

02

Spencer Brown

Spencer Brown is a Progressive House & Techno artist based in San Francisco, California. With over 200+ unreleased IDs, Spencer Brown is one of the most productive producers in the lineup.

03

Lane 8

Lane 8 is a Progressive House artist who is the owner of This Never Happened. He releases frequently on the label and is hoping to release a few during his set.

04

Ben Bohmer

Ben Bohmer is a House artist who specializes in the growing Melodic House subgenre. He debuted on our last tour with his Flug & Fall on Anjunadeep Explorations 04.

Schedule

Our biggest event to date, Explorations will celebrate the ideals of discovery and connection behind the label’s sound and its global community of fans. The boutique festival plays host to almost 50 label artists, including Lane 8, Yotto, Dusky, Moon Boots, Eli & Fur, 16BL, Luttrell, Jody Wisternoff and James Grant, who’ll all be gracing the main stage throughout the week.
